name: npc_chat
title: This is an Example of a Title
speaker: Judy
helper: This action will fire a npc chat above the head of the NPC, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.

name: random_npc_chat
title: Hey you're finally awake!
Hey! Listen!
I'm all out of gum
speaker: Judy
helper: This action will fire a npc chat Above the Npc's Head, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.
helperTitle: Dialog : run a random npc chat

name: subtitle
title: Hey you're finally awake!
speaker: Judy
helper: This action will fire a subtitle on your bottom portion of the screen, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.

name: news_subtitle
title: Hey you're finally awake!
speaker: Judy
helper: This action will fire a radio subtitle on your bottom portion of the screen, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. usecorponews field at true will display an random CorpoNews

name: do_random_dialog
helper: This action will fire a random dialog from the list of your dialog tags. NOTE: Which ever one is in the list, Their Trigger requirements have to be met.

name: random_subtitle
title: Donk is my lover
16 time the detail
You were trying to cross the boarder right?
speaker: Judy
helper: This action will fire a random subtitle on your bottom portion of the screen, The duration must complete in order for the next action to call. Type value just keep at 1 for now.

name: spawn_npc
position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
help: This action will summon a custom npc with several custom parameter
helper: This action will summon a custom npc with several custom parameter

name: spawn_vehicule_v2
position_change_helper:
Write 'current' in position_tag for get current node,mappin, fasttravel, custom_place or custom_room. 
 For poi if you write 'current' in position_poi_district you will get the current district, 
 if you write 'current in position_poi_subdistrict you will get the current subdistrict. 
 also if you write 'random' in position_poi_subdistrict or position_poi_district, you will get an 'random' value
help: This action will summon a Vehicle with several custom parameter
helper: This action will summon Vehicle with several custom parameter

helper: This action will spawn the vehicle

helper: This action will toggle the av engine for the current drived vehicle
helperTitle: Vehicule : Toggle AV Engine for Drived Vehicle

helper: This action will start autodrive of vehicle to the autodrive saved location

name: set_gang_relation
helper:
This action will set relation score between two gang (can be negative).
 If you put 'player' in tag field, it will take player's current Gang.
 Available Mode : gang || district_leader || district_subleader || current_district_leader || current_district_subleader

name: add_gang_relation
helper:
This action will add relation score between two gang (can be negative).
 If you put 'player' in tag field, it will take player's current Gang.
 Available Mode : gang || district_leader || district_subleader || current_district_leader || current_district_subleader || district_leader || district_leader || district_leader || district_leader

name: spawn_camera
helper: This action will spawn an camera object (type can be free or entity, entity will bound the camera to an entity current position and angle, coord become relative to it)

name: move_camera
helper: This action will move an camera object (type can be free or entity, entity will bound the camera to an entity current position and angle, coord become relative to it)

name: activate_camera
helper: This action will move an camera object (type can be free or entity, entity will bound the camera to an entity current position and angle)

name: delete_camera
helper: This action will delete an camera object

name: play_path
helper: This action will run a path for a entity.(zoffset) will separate in Z position the entity

name: run_group_path
helper: This action will run a path for a group of entity . (zoffset) will separate in Z position each entity, (separate) will separate each entity

name: reset_last_killed_entity
helper: This action will empty last killed entity

name: set_score
helper: This action will set a value for a key of a score

name: operate_score
helper: This action will operate a value for a key of a score. Operator can be + | -| * | / | positive | negative | random (who take min and max value)

name: concate_variable_with_score
helper: This action will concatenate a value from a score/key combo to a key of a Variable

name: for_entity_around_you
helper:
This action will register each entity founded in the player's view in an determined range and filter. 
 leave filter at [] for take all. 
 The filter will check in the name, display name and appearance of the entity 
 The founded entities will be registred in script manager and added in an group called temp_around_group. 
 Fill the action list will perform theses action to each founded entities.
